short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically shows Amazon product search results on Google Seach page's right side.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goozon automatically shows Amazon product search results on the right hand side of the Google search page for the same search terms. And with a single click you can see more results on Amazon for the same search. For example, if you search for 'Nike Shoes', it will show the Nike shoes available on Amazon on the right side. Click on 'Show all products on Amazon' link to see all the nike shoes on Amazon.
